plot: A couple seeks to replace their incompetent maid, but have very different ideas about the ideal qualities of the new hire. Each gets a chance to make a selection, but things don't go as either of them hoped.
title: The Servant Girl Problem
plot_es: A couple seeks to replace their incompetent maid, but have very different ideas about the ideal qualities of the new hire. Each gets a chance to make a selection, but things don't go as either of them hoped.
plot_en: A couple seeks to replace their incompetent maid, but have very different ideas about the ideal qualities of the new hire. Each gets a chance to make a selection, but things don't go as either of them hoped.
